property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Choose a number for X. Deplete X characters you control. Pick a character.
If the the picked character has X+X strength or less, destroy it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
This turn, the character gains COVERT. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, put a card from your hand on the bottom of your deck if you can. If you do, draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value: Put any number of cards from your hand on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the top X cards of your deck into your hand, where X is the number of cards you put on the bottom plus 1.

property.name: Text
property.value: When an attacking or blocking party is formed, it must have an even number of members.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only if you have at least 5 cards in your deck. Deplete up to 5 characters you control. X is the number of characters you deplete this way.
Search your deck for 5 cards and reveal them. An opponent chooses X of those cards. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest into your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
FORESIGHT
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Look at up to the top 5 cards of any one deck. Put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of your turn, pick a character an opponent controls. It gains COVERT until the start of your next turn.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE ASHES OF ZENOBIA
At the start of your turn, draw a card.
NULLIFY
COST: Pay 5.
EFFECT: Each player puts a character they control into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
While this card is a member of an attacking party, the party is COVERT.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card inflicts damage to a faction, that faction's controller puts a card from their hand on the top of their deck if they can.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Your opponents cannot respond to this card. Pick an opponent.
That player discards a card. You may deploy a non-resource card with numeric cost X or less for free, where X is the numeric cost of the discarded card. (You still need to meet its threshold and satisfy its extra costs.) Repeat this card's effect until that player has no cards in their hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: Reveal the top 7 cards of an opponent's deck. Put all tactics revealed this way into the void. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of that player's deck in any order. For the rest of the game, you may deploy tactics voided by this card as though they were in your hand without meeting their threshold.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Name a card.
Search your deck for any number of copies of the card and reveal them. Put 1 into your hand and the rest into your discard pile. An opponent may search your deck for any number of copies of the card. If they do, put them into your discard pile.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
When this card enters play, put a token on the attached character.
The attached character gains 1 strength and 1 life for each token on it.
HANDOFF
COST: Pay 1. Deplete a character you control that is not in a battle.
EFFECT: Attach this card to the character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COUNTERFEIT
COST: Use this only if a tactic has been deployed this turn. Pay 2+X, where X is the numeric cost of the last tactic deployed this turn. Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Duplicate the tactic.

property.name: Text
property.value:
UNIQUE ELDRIDGE
At the start of your turn, you may pick 2 or fewer non-resource cards you control. If you do, put up to 2 tokens divided however you want on those cards.
EJECT
COST: Remove 3 tokens from this card. Pick a non-resource card.
EFFECT: Put the card into its owner's hand.
DISRUPT
COST: Remove 3 tokens from this card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: You may pick a character you control.
When this card enters play, if you picked a character as part of its cost, put 2 tokens on that character.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick 2 or fewer characters.
This turn, the characters lose 1 speed. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a non-resource card.
Put the card into its owner's hand. Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card attacks, you may pick a character. If you do, put it into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card leaves play, an opponent discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
At the start of your turn, you may pick a non-resource card you control. If you do, put a token on it.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
This card gains 1 strength and 1 life for each face-down resource each opponent controls.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card inflicts damage to a faction, that faction's controller discards 2 cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ATTACH TO CHARACTER
The attached character cannot attack or block.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a resource you control. (You can pick face-down resources.)
Put the resource into its owner's hand. You may play a resource.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card enters play, look at up to the top 5 cards of any one deck. Put them back in any order.

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at the top 3 cards of your deck. You may put any number of those cards on the bottom of your deck in any order. Put the remaining cards on the top of your deck in any order. Draw a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
Each opponent's hand is revealed at all times.
DISAPPROVE
COST: Pay 2. Name a card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand. That player puts a card with the chosen name on the bottom of their deck if they can. If they do, that player draws a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character.
Put the character into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
This card enters play with 2 tokens on it.
EJECT
COST: Remove 2 tokens from this card. Pick a non-resource card.
EFFECT: Put the card into its owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: This turn, if a card would be put into a player's hand, put it into their discard pile instead.

property.name: Text
property.value:
DISRUPT
COST: Pay 2. Discard a card. Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
RECALL
COST: Pick a resource you control. (You can pick face-down resources.)
EFFECT: Put the resource into it's owner's hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a tactic in your discard pile.
Put the tactic into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a character. X is its strength.
If that character's controller controls at least X face-down resources, destroy the character.

property.name: Text
property.value: An opponent discards a card. You may search your deck for a card of the same type as the discarded card and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Choose a number for X. Pay X+X.
Look at an opponent's hand and choose X or fewer cards in it. That player discards those cards.

property.name: Text
property.value:
COVERT
When this card enters play, you may pick a tactic in your discard pile. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters play, you may search your deck for a tactic and reveal it. If you do, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value:
ENERGIZE
COST: Deplete this card. Pick a non-resource card you control.
EFFECT: Put a token on the card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Pick a non-resource card. X is half its numeric cost, rounded up.
Put the card into its owner's hand. You may deploy a non-resource card with numeric cost X or less for free. (You still need to meet its threshold and satisfy its extra costs.)

property.name: Text
property.value: Look at an opponent's hand and choose a non-resource card in it. That player discards that card. You may deploy a non-resource card with numeric cost X or less for free, where X is half the numeric cost of the discarded card, rounded up. (You still need to meet its threshold and satisfy its extra costs.)

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card enters or leaves play, an opponent discards a card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
LOBOTOMIZE
COST: Deplete this card.
EFFECT: Look at an opponent's hand and choose 2 or fewer non-resource cards in it. That player discards those cards. That player takes control of this card.

property.name: Text
property.value: While you control an even number of characters, reduce the numeric cost of tactics you deploy by 1, to a minimum of 1.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only during your turn and not during a battle. Pick a character you control.
Destroy the character if you can. If you do, X is its numeric cost. Search your deck for a character with numeric cost X+3 or less and reveal it. You may deploy it for free. If you don't, put it into your hand.

property.name: Text
property.value: When this card is destroyed by battle damage, an opponent discards their hand.

property.value: muddler, lurker

property.name: Text
property.value:
When this card enters play, look at an opponent's hand and choose a card in it. That player discards that card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
EXTRA COST: Deploy this only in response to a card being deployed. (Playing a resource doesn't count.)
Terminate the card, but put it into its owner's hand instead of their discard pile. Its owner puts a card from their hand on the top of their deck.

property.name: Text
property.value:
At the start of your turn, you may put a token on this card.

property.name: Text
property.value:
You may remove any number of tokens from cards you control. Use the tokens to generate the following effects any number of times:
1 TOKEN: Pick a character. Inflict 1 damage to it.
2 TOKENS: Draw a card.
2 TOKENS: An opponent discards a card.
3 TOKENS: Search your deck for a card and put it into your hand.

property.value:

The attached character cannot be restored by its controller's faction's Restore Rule.

property.name: Text
property.value:
At the start of each player's turn, that player chooses one of the following:
OPTION 1: That player may draw a card and their opponents may play a resource.
OPTION 2: That player may play a resource and their opponents may draw a card.
OPTION 3: Each player may draw up to 2 cards.
OPTION 4: Each player may play up to 2 resources.

property.name: Text
property.value: At the start of each player's turn, that player reveals cards from the top of their deck until a character is revealed or no cards are left. If a character is revealed, players take turns bidding on the character (starting with the active player). Players cannot bid a number greater than the number of detached resources they control. Whichever player makes the winning bid pays that many resources and puts the character into play under their control. Shuffle all other revealed cards into their owners's deck.

property.value:

property.value:

EFFECT: Reveal the top card of your deck. You may deploy it. (You can't play resources with this ability.)
CHANGE COSTUME

UNIQUE PLUCK
You may use abilities on your opponent's cards, but you must pay any numeric cost with your own resources. Any additional costs must be satisfied as though your opponent is using the ability. The ability's effect happens as if your opponent used it.

property.value:
